dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A record 35 billion dollar IPO, just halted by Chinese regulators for Ant Group.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A record thirty five billion dollar I P O, just halted by Chinese regulators for Ant Group.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Chinas regulators abruptly halted Ants record $35 billion IPO and subsequently announced investigations into its sprawling business in November.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and that was back in November, right? It's uh, it's really set off this whole chain of events.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and that was back in November, right? It's uh, it's really set off this whole chain of events.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Chinas regulators abruptly halted Ants record $35 billion IPO and subsequently announced investigations into its sprawling business in November.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And now they're saying Ant has to put everything, like even its blockchain tech, into one single holding company.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And now they're saying Ant has to put everything, like even its blockchain tech, into one single holding company.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Quoting anonymous sources familiar with the matter, the report said the plan requires Ant to place all of its businesses into the holding company, including its technology offerings in areas like blockchain and food-delivery.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which is a huge restructuring. And the CEO of Alibaba, Daniel Zhang, he warned about substantial uncertainties just a day before this news broke.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is a huge restructuring. And the C E O of Alibaba, Daniel Zhang, he warned about substantial uncertainties just a day before this news broke.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In a call with analysts just a day earlier, Alibabas BABA -3.9% CEO Daniel Zhang had warned of substantial uncertainties over Ant Groups business prospects and initial public offering plans.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and Alibaba itself is under its own pressure with that anti-monopoly probe. They're being investigated for that "choose one of two" policy for merchants.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and Alibaba itself is under its own pressure with that anti-monopoly probe. They're being investigated for that choose one of two policy for merchants.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Its said to be under investigation for alleged monopolistic business practices like er xuan yi, which means choose one of two.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Forcing them to be exclusive. That's a massive deal. And they've set up a special task force to deal with it, cooperating with SAMR.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Forcing them to be exclusive. That's a massive deal. And they've set up a special task force to deal with it, cooperating with S A M R.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On Tuesday, Alibaba said that it had established a special task force to conduct internal reviews, and will cooperate with the State Administration for Market Regulation (SAMR) in its ongoing investigation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But despite all that, their earnings are still strong. Sales jumped 37% to over 221 billion yuan last quarter.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But despite all that, their earnings are still strong. Sales jumped thirty seven percent to over two hundred twenty one billion yuan last quarter.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sales for the three months ended in December jumped another 37% to 221.08 billion yuan ($34.24 billion).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which is wild, but the stock still fell almost 4% in Hong Kong. The regulatory risk is just overshadowing everything.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is wild, but the stock still fell almost four percent in Hong Kong. The regulatory risk is just overshadowing everything.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Alibabas shares fell almost 4% in Hong Kong on Wednesday amid concerns about the companys ongoing regulatory challenges.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And then there's Jack Ma, conspicuously left out of that state media list of entrepreneurial leaders. That's a pretty public signal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then there's Jack Ma, conspicuously left out of that state media list of entrepreneurial leaders. That's a pretty public signal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Alibabas billionaire cofounder Jack Ma, a former English teacher who has long been the face of entrepreneurship and innovation in China, was conspicuously left out of a list of Chinas entrepreneurial leaders compiled by state media this week.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: He had just reappeared in January after vanishing for months. But analysts are saying the bigger risk is for Ant, with new capital requirements changing its whole business model.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He had just reappeared in January after vanishing for months. But analysts are saying the bigger risk is for Ant, with new capital requirements changing its whole business model.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ma had only just made his first public appearance in January after disappearing from public view for nearly three months. Brock Silvers, a Hong Kong-based chief investment officer of Kaiyuan Capital, says the regulatory risk is more real for Ant.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Brock Silvers from Kaiyuan Capital said any new IPO would have significantly lower pricing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Brock Silvers from Kaiyuan Capital said any new I P O would have significantly lower pricing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: New capital requirements will completely change Ants business model, and any new IPO would be saddled with significantly lower pricing, he said in an email.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And it's not just regulatorsâ€”Alibaba's facing more competition too, from JD.com, Pinduoduo, and even short video apps.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's not just regulators-Alibaba's facing more competition too, from the website, Pinduoduo, and even short video apps.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Besides direct challenges from e-commerce platforms JD.com and Pinduoduo, Alibaba also has to increasingly compete with short video sites for the attention of shoppers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, Shawn Yang mentioned Bytedance's Douyin, with over 600 million daily users, adding e-commerce features.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, Shawn Yang mentioned Bytedance's Douyin, with over six hundred million daily users, adding e-commerce features.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For example, Bytedance, the parent company of short video app TikTok, is experimenting with adding more e-commerce and payment features to TikToks Chinese version, Douyin, which has more than 600 million daily active users in the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So the investigation might actually force Alibaba to charge merchants less to keep them from leaving. It's a perfect storm.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So the investigation might actually force Alibaba to charge merchants less to keep them from leaving. It's a perfect storm.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The anti-monopoly investigation may expedite this trend, and the company may have to charge merchants less to ensure they will stay.
